nodes.text: Trella Bare'Ah was a female Twi'lek dancer who worked in Jabba's Palace on Tatooine. She was also the lover of Greedo.
During the start of the Clone Wars, she met a Rodian bounty hunter Greedo and was romantically involved with him.

In 21 BBY, Trella was present in the palace with a few Twi'leks when Chairman Notluwiski Papanoida and his son, Ion Papanoida were searching for Greedo. She went to them and asked what they wanted from Greedo. When the Chairman told her that he was here to hire a bounty hunter, Trella went to find Greedo and told him about the Pantorans that were searching for him.
Trella Bare'Ah is voiced by Jennifer Hale in The Clone Wars television series.
